name: Star Frontier
description:
The spaceship needs to go back to the portal, but lots of roadmap has been lost!

Will you use puzzle solving skills to find the right way and continue to travel?
Enjoy the classic pipe connection theme game, funny twists and make sure the spaceship reaches the end of the road!
Train your brain and let's start the Star Frontier!

HOW TO PLAY?
. Drag the blocks to move them.
. Try to fit them in the roadmap.
. Make the spaceship reaches the end.
. Blocks can't be rotated.

TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
. Over 600+ puzzles are unique and full of fun and amazing challenges!

Notes
. Easy to play game for all ages.
. You can play offline in anytime.
. Enjoy the game with various devices. (Phones and Tablets)
. This game contains the ads like banner, interstitial, and reward video ads.
